name: $context
desc: Returns: Type or variable this rule applies to.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Type or variable this rule applies to.

name: $min
desc: Returns: Specified minimum cardinality for the element. This is optional; if present, it acts an implicit check on the input content.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Specified minimum cardinality for the element. This is optional; if present, it acts an implicit check on the input content.

name: $max
desc: Returns: Specified maximum cardinality for the element - a number or a "*". This is optional; if present, it acts an implicit check on the input content (* just serves as documentation; it's the default value).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Specified maximum cardinality for the element - a number or a "*". This is optional; if present, it acts an implicit check on the input content (* just serves as documentation; it's the default value).

name: $::type
desc: Returns: Specified type for the element. This works as a condition on the mapping - use for polymorphic elements.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Specified type for the element. This works as a condition on the mapping - use for polymorphic elements.

name: $element
desc: Returns: Optional field for this source.

name: $listMode
desc: Returns: How to handle the list mode for this element.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: How to handle the list mode for this element.

name: $variable
desc: Returns: Named context for field, if a field is specified.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Named context for field, if a field is specified.

name: $condition
desc: Returns: FHIRPath expression  - must be true or the rule does not apply.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: FHIRPath expression  - must be true or the rule does not apply.

name: $check
desc: Returns: FHIRPath expression  - must be true or the mapping engine throws an error instead of completing.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: FHIRPath expression  - must be true or the mapping engine throws an error instead of completing.
